Lotto: Mammoth $20 million jackpot rolls over to Saturday, highest amount of 2024 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-mammoth-20-million-jackpot-up-for-grabs-highest-amount-of-2024/LAKXS4QUV5ERND6RQ6EODCKPWE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lotto-mammoth-20-million-jackpot-up-for-grabs-highest-amount-of-2024/LAKXS4QUV5ERND6RQ6EODCKPWE/ Twelve Lotto punters have become millionaires in 2024 but there was no big winner tonight. Wed, 03 Apr 2024 06:32:13 +0000 A jackpot of $20 million was up for grabs in tonight's Lotto draw, the largest amount in 2024, and it will now roll over to Saturday.
